sense.def:
Besedo
everywhere
uporabljamo, kadar govorimo o celotnem območju ali vseh krajih na določenem območju.

seg.quote: Everywhere in Asia it is the same.
People everywhere are becoming aware of the problem.

sense.def:
Besedo
everywhere
uporabljamo tudi, kadar govorimo o vseh krajih, kamor nekdo gre.

seg.quote: Everywhere I went, people were angry or suspicious.
She always carried a gun with her everywhere.
